headline: Newmont, Freeport-McMoRan Stocks Rally on Soaring Prices
summary: Shares in big gold miners rose after the price of the metal surged above $5,000 for the first time. Barrick Mining, Newmont and Freeport-McMoRan all advanced in early trading Monday, adding to already strong gains so far this year.

headline: Gold Miners Rally On Soaring Prices
summary: Shares in big gold miners rose after the price of the metal surged above $5,000 for the first time. Barrick Mining, Newmont and Freeport-McMoRan all advanced in premarket trading Monday, adding to already strong gains so far this year.

raw.headline: Gold Miners Rally On Soaring Prices
raw.summary: Shares in big gold miners rose after the price of the metal surged above $5,000 for the first time. Barrick Mining, Newmont and Freeport-McMoRan all advanced in premarket trading Monday, adding to already strong gains so far this year.

headline: Newmont, Freeport, and Other Mining Stocks Jump as Gold Surges. More Gains Are Ahead.
summary: Gold miners, in turn, have picked up the baton.  In premarket trading,  SSR Mining  was up 4.8%, while  Newmont  and  Freeport-McMoRan  climbed 4.3% and 4%, respectively.  Higher gold prices typically increase mining companies’ revenue and margins.

raw.headline: Newmont, Freeport, and Other Mining Stocks Jump as Gold Surges. More Gains Are Ahead.
raw.summary: Gold miners, in turn, have picked up the baton.  In premarket trading,  SSR Mining  was up 4.8%, while  Newmont  and  Freeport-McMoRan  climbed 4.3% and 4%, respectively.  Higher gold prices typically increase mining companies’ revenue and margins.

headline: Stocks Set for Muted Open After Trump’s Tariff Threats, Big Tech Earnings and Fed Meeting in Focus
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are down -0.05%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are down -0.14% this morning, pointing to a muted open on Wall Street as President Trump’s tariff threats against Canada and the looming risk of a partial U.S. government shutdown curbed risk appetite at the start of a busy week.
